title: Bobby Callender - The Way  (1968/2004) [APE]
description:
Bobby Callender - The Way (First Book of Experiences) (1968) [2004]

Genre: US, Oriental Folk Psychedelic Rock

No Artwork

Tracklist:

1. Drone - Going Back - Ist and 2nd Movement
2. Awaken John - Lord Am I Dreamnng
3. Bhodi Tree
4. Satori
5. Story of Rasha and Dhara
6. Chant: Kasha and Dhara and Love, Love, Love
7. Shringara
8. 3rd Movement - Satyagraha
9. Transmigration - Travel With Me
10. Karma Yogi
11. 4th Movement - Ooda Rata Travel With Me
12. Story of the Shepherd
13. Let Thy Will Be Done
14. Hari Om and Deva Chant Interlude
15. Santa Grace
16. Going Back Instrumental/Ooda Chant and Ending

Personel:
Tambourine, drums - Marty Kahl
Bass - Larry Porcelli
Guitar - LArry Corso
Piano, organ-Vito Rendace
Drums on 2, 3 - Alan Shildkraut
Piano, guitar on 2, 3 - Mickey Lane (Shalom)
Flutes - IraCossin, Judah Englesberg

Spoken Introductions - directed by Christiane Kapp
